noun.description: A person who believes in the existence of a god or gods, specifically of a creator who intervenes in the universe.
examples: I am a hardcore theist and the person most close to me is my God

adjective.description: Denoting or relating to belief in the existence of a god or gods, specifically of a creator who intervenes in the universe.
examples: most atheists were were raised in a theist tradition

origin: Mid 17th century: from Greek theos god + -ist.
